definition: A term commonly used to describe a place or setting where practical skills, knowledge, or theories are put into action, often in a professional or vocational context. It typically refers to a location where individuals gain hands-on experience and apply their theoretical understanding in real-world scenarios.

examples.english: I have a practice visit today.

examples.german: Sie hat eine eigene Praxis eröffnet.
examples.english: She has opened her own practice.

examples.german: Die Praxis ist von Montag bis Freitag geöffnet.
examples.english: The practice is open from Monday to Friday.

examples.german: Er hat viel Erfahrung in der Praxis gesammelt.
examples.english: He has gained a lot of experience in practice.
